body:
> @kang558 Sorry, it does not work on SVG Rendering.

最近有合适的方案吗？？
遇到个需求是拉伸整个图片，svg可以显示一个原有的图片，canvas就是没有拖拉背景，因此svg比较合适，但是需要用到rich就炸了

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

Have a nice day! 🍵

Last 3 datas' value are 0, 
https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/chart/graph/circularLayoutHelper.js#L45
So the last 3 circle will overlap.
@tkamkb @afetmin 可以提供一个例子吗？
You can use [dataset](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#dataset). Please refer to the document.
Can you provide a demo at https://jsfiddle.net/ovilia/n6xc4df3/ ?
暂时没有 windows 机器复现，或许你可以尝试一下使用 svg  https://echarts.apache.org/zh/tutorial.html#%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%20Canvas%20%E6%88%96%E8%80%85%20SVG%20%E6%B8%B2%E6%9F%93

Sorry, but please ask *how-to* questions on [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/echarts) or [segmentfault（中文）](https://segmentfault.com/t/echarts). 

Here's why:

Maintaining open source projects, especially popular ones, is [hard work](https://nolanlawson.com/2017/03/05/what-it-feels-like-to-be-an-open-source-maintainer/). As ECharts's user base has grown, we are getting more and more usage questions, bug reports, feature requests and pull requests every single day.

As a free and open source project, ECharts also has limited maintainer bandwidth. That means the only way to ensure the project's sustainability is to:

1. Prioritize more concrete work (bug fixes and new features);
2. Improve issue triaging efficiency.

For (1), we have decided to use the GitHub issue lists exclusively for work that has well-defined, actionable goals. Questions and open ended discussions should be posted to mediums that are better suited for them.

For (2), we have found that issues that do not provide proper information upfront usually results in terribly inefficient back-and-forth communication just to extract the basic information needed for actual triaging. This is exactly why we have created this app: to ensure that every issue is created with the necessary information, and to save time on both sides.
Do you mean the numbers should be displayed on the sides of data zoom component when the mouse leaves? But this is not expected since the text should only be visible when the mouse is over.
Please see the demos [here](https://echarts.apache.org/examples/en/index.html). https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-examples/public/ will be fixed and redirect to that later.

Thanks @Ovilia,

No, I mean that the data zoom selected region must continue dragging even though the mouse leaves the canvas container. If you click the zoom region and move the mouse outside the canvas, while it is selected, it should continue moving.

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

Have a nice day! 🍵

Currently, we only support [canvas for server-side rendering](https://echarts.apache.org/en/tutorial.html#Server-side%20Rendering), and of course, interaction is not supported.
I think it's a good idea to use SVG so that the interaction can be preserved, although we should do extra work to support this.

![ezgif com-video-to-gif](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2999604/58847675-74b0f700-8649-11e9-86c9-bbef1c8cf021.gif)

This is a better version of the wrong behavior I'm talking about. My mouse is always pressed, but if the cursor goes out the canvas container, you can see that the zoom region just stops moving.
这个例子并没有设计成响应式的，如果想改进的话，欢迎在 https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts-examples/blob/gh-pages/public/data/calendar-pie.js 项目提 PR。
主题使用方式参考 https://echarts.apache.org/zh/download-theme.html ，如果和 angular 框架相关，请到那个项目下提问，谢谢。
I see your point. I think the current behavior is to prevent no getting mouse up the event when outside the canvas, because we cannot get the mouse up event any more when it happens outside canvas.

Sorry, but please ask *how-to* questions on [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/echarts) or [segmentfault（中文）](https://segmentfault.com/t/echarts). 

Here's why:

Maintaining open source projects, especially popular ones, is [hard work](https://nolanlawson.com/2017/03/05/what-it-feels-like-to-be-an-open-source-maintainer/). As ECharts's user base has grown, we are getting more and more usage questions, bug reports, feature requests and pull requests every single day.

As a free and open source project, ECharts also has limited maintainer bandwidth. That means the only way to ensure the project's sustainability is to:

1. Prioritize more concrete work (bug fixes and new features);
2. Improve issue triaging efficiency.

For (1), we have decided to use the GitHub issue lists exclusively for work that has well-defined, actionable goals. Questions and open ended discussions should be posted to mediums that are better suited for them.

For (2), we have found that issues that do not provide proper information upfront usually results in terribly inefficient back-and-forth communication just to extract the basic information needed for actual triaging. This is exactly why we have created this app: to ensure that every issue is created with the necessary information, and to save time on both sides.

](url)
@zhaobinhong 要看是什么类型的图表了，有具体问题可以再开一个新的 issue
I cannot tell without code. Basically, you have to provide the code where you set the resize logic.
用echart画流程图,功能太弱小了,用go.js或者用joint.js,这两个库都是比较好的.功能也强大.

> > 上述方法有效了，是我第二步没做对
> 
> 请问下注释后，第二步改成随机曲度没有用是怎么回事？

我是注释加了，没效果，随机曲度没问题，echart是不是最多两条，还是只能显示一样的数据
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26756964/58853394-b8991000-86cc-11e9-9bf8-7e9535d9c6ef.png)

It should work now. Please make sure using HTTPS instead of HTTP.
https://echarts.apache.org/examples/en/editor.html?c=graph

Have you tried adding `console.log` to `disposeChart` to make sure it has been called? Maybe the DOM element is removed before it is called. And you should set `_private(this)._chart = null` after disposing.
You may probably not need to dispose these charts. You can call `chart.resize()` to resize them according to container size.
@Ovilia svg之前我也试了，也是没能实现效果，我之前用zrender的时候也遇到过这个问题，我以为是没配置好，后来文档也没找到相关信息，反正切换成ie11，默认的高亮效果和事件都没了

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

Not enough information to know what's going on.
I'd suggest you make a minimum demo on jsfiddle.

You can listen to hover events by `chart.on('mouseover', function(n) { ...})` and use setOption to update style in callback function. See https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.Mouse%20events.mouseover for more information.

Hi @100pah ,

from the params I can access the seriesId, seriesIndex, seriesName and seriesType.
I can then use the seriesIndex and the chart options to retrieve the y axis index for the specific series.
But I believe it is too much effort for something that is commonly needed in the tooltip formatter callback.

It seems that now this issue it addressed with this commit : https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/pull/10437/commits/cba87b0ce1489a0e092d39689ab38af3e5505871 which includes the axis info in the params. Hopefully this axis contains both X and Y axis information.

> series 的 animation 设为 false 试下

正常的动画效果要保留
tab切换的时候我调用了resize，就是像去掉这个resize带来的动画效果。
因为从0开始变大，效果不是很理想。

如果关闭不了这个动画，那么有没有办法tab隐藏的时候，echarts的高度和宽度不是0，而是实际的数值？
现在echart最外层那个div，在tab隐藏的时候宽度和高度都是0，应该是这个引起的。

@Stevenjordison 您好，我引入的是广东省地图  guangdong.js vue里使用这个地图能显示，但是21个地级市的名称没有显示出来，label都是设置了 show:true。怎样解决呢？因为看到你的地图上有这些名称。。。

您好 我也遇到这个问题了 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30359281/59004805-94b10800-884d-11e9-8367-b3131632baaa.png) 文档貌似没有设置间距的配置项 请问怎么解决？期待回复
I don't think ECharts supports highlight the line.

I think you should make a [custom toolbox feature](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#toolbox.feature) and in `onclick`, add watermark with [graphic](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#graphic) and get the image using [getDataURL](https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#echartsInstance.getDataURL).
当容器大小变化后，请调用 `chart.resize()`
@MINDoSOFT Thanks for the report. It has been fixed now.

@sxmpasch It has been fixed now. Please visit https://echarts.apache.org/zh/tutorial.html#%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%20dataset%20%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE
Note that the Chinese link is not exactly as English one because it reads the title of the page, and the Chinese title is no the same with the English one.
已修复，请在 https://echarts.apache.org/examples/en/editor.html?c=map-polygon&theme=dark 查看。echarts.baidu.com 的域名将在稍后迁移到 apache 域名。

如果是 使用百度地图 + 散点图（或者其他图形，具体我没试）！我通过 animation: false  关闭了动画效果，就解决了 拖动地图 Echart 跟随拖动的问题了！

官方列子中：[https://echarts.baidu.com/examples/editor.html?c=map-polygon](url)，加入 `animation: false` ，如下：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19389294/59011734-304f7200-8868-11e9-9801-eaf517e6e563.png)

Yes that sounds like a reasonable solution. 
Thank you for your help !
目前好像不支持，但这个功能挺有用的。

@Ovilia Sure, challenge accepted.
I'm sorry, misunderstanding from my side. I managed to do what I intended. Closing the issue.

Hi Ovilia, I found out there was a memory leak in our code. 
This issue can be closed. Thank you for your time.

![Screenshot 2019-06-07 at 08 54 46](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1381527/59086434-fcc12600-8901-11e9-9a99-25beb9dc12f3.png)

I think it's relates to this bug as well. Firefox 67, SVG, BarChart with echarts 4.2.1

https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/echarts.js#L1666
https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/model/globalDefault.js#L78
https://github.com/ecomfe/zrender/blob/master/src/Painter.js#L336
Threshold value is 3000, but data count is lager than 3000,  that led the zlevel of  hoverlayer will be 10000, which will cover whole section, and that's why we saw 'blink'.
Obviously hoverLayerThreshold is for optimization reason, for this particular case, 3000 is not satisfied, but finally hoverLayerThreshold value need further discussion.  @Ovilia @100pah

> 怀疑是自定义图表对dataZoom的支持不是很好

那有没有什么办法可以临时解决一下这个问题。比如说修改某个参数的默认值，因为我发现1000个数据点这个规模是个临界点，当数据量小于1000的时候从未出现过这样的问题 但是当数据量一旦大于等于1000就一定会出现这种问题。

Sorry, I'm afraid we don't have such instructions currently. Mostly because to provide such a document, we have to cover so much detail that it doesn't seem possible right now.
To make a custom axis, the simplest way is to change the source code, add a `XXXAxisView.js` that extends `CartesianAxisView.js` under `src/component/axis`. Then, you should probably need to search for `CartesianAxisView` and replace it when necessary.
Did you have `zrender` installed at the same directory with `incubator-echarts`?
